name: Ice Rush
description:
The game was created for 2017 February 1GAM.

Set off for a skiing adventure. Rush through challenging tracks in snow-covered woods and get to know the locals. Although these creatures tend to be friendly it's better not get in their way. Make your way through different paths of a game as fast as you can and stay safe. See how fast and far you can ski without meeting a Yeti or painfully smashing into the tree.

* 15 hand-crafted challenges.

* Different obstacles.
